The Logrus Denizens Household Community archive

Rachel

RACHEL ARIANE ABIGAIL RUTH MCLEAN

I'm Rachel. I'm 16, and in love with ballet. I'm in my last year of high school. I love to read, but I love writing even more. I love art – usually sketching but I've done the odd water colour or acrylic painting.

While I dance I cannot judge, I cannot hate, I cannot separate myself from life. I can only be joyful and whole. That is why I dance.

~ Hans Bos
